hero.title: Sartthi: The Operating System for Modern Work.
hero.subtitle: Streamline operations, synchronize teams, and automate the mundane. The all-in-one suite designed to move your business forward.

taskManagement.title: Task Management
taskManagement.description: Create, assign, and track with precision. A workflow so clear, nothing falls through the cracks.

collaboration.title: Real-Time Collaboration
collaboration.description: Unified workspaces, instant updates, and threaded context. Keep everyone aligned, everywhere.

analytics.title: Intelligence & Analytics
analytics.description: Turn data into decisions. Visualize project health, team velocity, and ROI in real-time.

useCases.title: Built for Every Team. Optimized for Every Workflow.

hr.title: HR & Payroll
hr.description: Automate attendance and payroll. Zero manual errors.

operations.title: Operations
operations.description: From planning to delivery‚Äîmonitor every moving part.

managers.title: Managers
managers.description: Approve requests and track performance from a single dashboard.

fieldTeams.title: Field Teams
fieldTeams.description: Seamless coordination between the office and the frontline.

finance.title: Finance
finance.description: Accurate records and expense monitoring without the tool fatigue.

founders.title: Founders
founders.description: Total visibility. See the pulse of your entire organization at a glance.

ai.title: AI That Acts. Not Just Thinks.
ai.subtitle: Most AI gives you ideas. Sartthi AI does the work‚Äîcreating schedules, drafting reports, and automating operations while you sleep.

permission.title: Permission Aware
permission.description: Secure by design. It knows who can see what.

context.title: Context Driven
context.description: It learns your workflow to provide proactive solutions.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: We're building the future of project management, one feature at a time.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Sartthi, we believe that great projects start with great tools. Our mission is to simplify project management and make it accessible to teams of all sizes. We're committed to providing intuitive, powerful, and reliable solutions that help teams collaborate effectively and achieve their goals.

items.scalable: Scalable solutions for teams of any size

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Sartthi is built by a passionate team of developers, designers, and project management experts who understand the challenges of modern team collaboration. We're constantly working to improve our platform and add new features based on user feedback.

address.label: Address:
address.line2: Near Reliance Petrol Pump, Surya Nagar

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.

userGuide.title: User Guide
userGuide.subtitle: Everything you need to know to get the most out of Sartthi.

signUp.title: Sign Up
signUp.description: Create your free account in seconds

createAccount.title: 1. Create Your Account
createAccount.description: Sign up for a free account to get started with Sartthi.

setupWorkspace.title: 2. Set Up Your Workspace
setupWorkspace.description: Create your first workspace and invite team members.

createProject.title: 3. Create Your First Project
createProject.description: Start by creating a project and adding tasks.

creating.title: Creating Projects
creating.description: Click the "Create Project" button to start a new project. Fill in the project details including name, description, and timeline.

settings.title: Project Settings
settings.description: Configure project settings, team permissions, and notification preferences.

analytics.title: Project Analytics
analytics.description: Track project progress with built-in analytics and reporting tools.

creating.title: Creating Tasks
creating.description: Add tasks to your projects with detailed descriptions, due dates, and assignees.

status.title: Task Status
status.description: Update task status: Todo, In Progress, Completed, or On Hold.

dependencies.title: Task Dependencies
dependencies.description: Set up task dependencies to ensure proper workflow order.

inviting.title: Inviting Team Members
inviting.description: Invite team members to your workspace and assign them to projects.

roles.title: Role Management
roles.description: Assign different roles and permissions to team members.

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: Use comments and mentions to communicate within tasks and projects.

projectAnalytics.title: Project Analytics
projectAnalytics.description: View detailed analytics on project progress, team performance, and time tracking.

customReports.title: Custom Reports
customReports.description: Generate custom reports for stakeholders and team members.

exportData.title: Export Data
exportData.description: Export project data in various formats for external analysis.

commonIssues.title: Common Issues
commonIssues.description: Find solutions to common problems and frequently asked questions.

performance.title: Performance Tips
performance.description: Optimize your Sartthi experience with these performance tips.

contact.title: Contact Support
contact.description: Get help from our support team when you need it.

support.title: Need More Help?
support.description: Our support team is here to help you succeed.

pricing.title: Unlock Sartthi's full Project & Payroll suite
pricing.subtitle: Choose a plan configured by your admins. Apply coupons or affiliate links at checkout, and upgrade instantly without a payment gateway.

authPrompt.title: Authentication required
authPrompt.message: Login or create an account to select the {{planName}} plan.
authPrompt.description: Already have an account? Continue to login. New to Sartthi? Sign up first, then complete the upgrade.

affiliate.title: Affiliate & coupon engine
affiliate.description: Reward evangelists, delight teams with instant savings.

footer.description: Empowering teams with innovative project management solutions. We build tools that help organizations streamline their workflows and achieve their goals efficiently.
footer.copyright: ¬© {{year}} The Tech Factory. All rights reserved.

workspace.proUserDesc: Unlock workspace freedom‚Äîmanage up to five workspaces with 5 projects each, 20 employees per project, no ads, and limited AI signals.
